localizedResources.title: .NET Framework 4.8 development tools
localizedResources.description: Framework runtime, tools, reference assemblies and IntelliSense to build and deploy .NET Framework 4.8 applications.

localizedResources.title: .NET Framework 4.8 开发工具
localizedResources.description: 用于生成和部署 .NET Framework 4.8 应用程序的框架运行时、工具、引用程序集和 IntelliSense。

localizedResources.title: .NET Framework 4.8 開發工具
localizedResources.description: 使用執行階段、工具、參考組件和 IntelliSense 來建置並部署 .NET Framework 4.8 應用程式。

localizedResources.title: Vývojové nástroje pro .NET Framework 4.8
localizedResources.description: Modul runtime architektury, nástroje, referenční sestavení a technologie IntelliSense pro sestavování a nasazování aplikací .NET Framework 4.8

localizedResources.title: .NET Framework 4.8-Entwicklungstools
localizedResources.description: Frameworkruntime, Tools, Referenzassemblys und IntelliSense zum Entwickeln und Bereitstellen von .NET Framework 4.8-Anwendungen.

localizedResources.title: Herramientas de desarrollo de .NET Framework 4.8
localizedResources.description: Entorno de ejecución de Framework, herramientas, ensamblados de referencia e IntelliSense para compilar e implementar aplicaciones de .NET Framework 4.8.

localizedResources.title: Outils de développement .NET Framework 4.8
localizedResources.description: Runtime de framework, outils, assemblys de référence et IntelliSense pour la génération et le déploiement d'applications .NET Framework 4.8.

localizedResources.title: Strumenti di sviluppo per .NET Framework 4.8
localizedResources.description: Runtime di framework, strumenti, assembly di riferimento e IntelliSense per compilare e distribuire applicazioni .NET Framework 4.8.

localizedResources.title: .NET Framework 4.8 開発ツール
localizedResources.description: .NET Framework 4.8 アプリケーションをビルドして配置するためのフレームワーク ランタイム、ツール、参照アセンブリ、IntelliSense。

localizedResources.title: .NET Framework 4.8 개발 도구
localizedResources.description: .NET Framework 4.8 애플리케이션을 빌드 및 배포하기 위한 프레임워크 런타임, 도구, 참조 어셈블리 및 IntelliSense입니다.

localizedResources.title: Narzędzia programistyczne platformy .NET Framework 4.8
localizedResources.description: Środowisko uruchomieniowe platformy, narzędzia, zestawy odwołań i technologia IntelliSense na potrzeby kompilowania i wdrażania aplikacji platformy .NET Framework 4.8.

localizedResources.title: Ferramentas de desenvolvimento do .NET Framework 4.8
localizedResources.description: Tempo de execução da estrutura, ferramentas, assemblies de referência e IntelliSense para criar e implantar aplicativos .NET Framework 4.8.

localizedResources.title: Средства разработки .NET Framework 4.8
localizedResources.description: Платформенная среда выполнения, инструменты, базовые сборки и IntelliSense для разработки и развертывания приложений .NET Framework 4.8.

localizedResources.title: .NET Framework 4.8 geliştirme araçları
localizedResources.description: NET Framework 4.8 uygulamalarını derlemeye ve dağıtmaya yönelik çerçeve çalışma zamanı, araçlar, başvuru derlemeleri ve IntelliSense.
